testcase.classname: Acceptance testing to validate Search page is working fine.
testcase.name: Validate search cars page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the home page "https://www.carsguide.com.au" of Carsguide.....passed When I move to the menu.....................................................passed And click on "Search Cars" link.............................................passed And Select carbrand as "BMW" from Anymake dropdown..........................passed And Select Any Model dropdown as "1 Series".................................passed And Select Any Location dropdown as "NSW - New England".....................passed And Select Any Price (max) dropdown as "$45,000"............................passed And Click on "Find My Next Car" button......................................passed Then I should see list of searched cars.....................................passed And the page title should be "Bmw 1 Series Under 45000 for Sale New England NSW | carsguide".passed

testcase.classname: Acceptance testing to validate Used Search cars page is working fine.
testcase.name: Validate used search cars page
testcase.system-out: Given I'm on the home page "https://www.carsguide.com.au" of Carsguide......passed When I hover over the menu..................................................passed And click on the "Used" link................................................passed And Select car brand as "Ford" from Anymake dropdown........................passed And Select Any_Model dropdown as "Mustang"..................................passed And Select Any_Location dropdown as "WA - All"..............................passed And Select Any_Price (max)..................................................passed And Click on "Find My Next Car" blue button.................................passed Then I should see a list of used cars.......................................passed And the page titles should be "Used Ford Mustang Under 200000 for Sale WA | carsguide".passed
